edu.harvard.cs262.DistributedGame.VotingGame

Class VotingGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.harvard.cs262.DistributedGame.VotingGame.VotingGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Game

    public class VotingGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements Game
    The VotingGame class represents and instance of the voting game. It holds the current state of the game, and it has methods for modifying the state and to run commands.
    Version:
    1.0, April 2014
    Author:
    Twitch Plays Battleship Group
